bio: 我是一位数字游民爱好者，来自于中国。从2020年开始接触区块链，optimism是我第一个接触时间最长的一个项目，平时会关注项目的走向，同时也会体验咱们项目的其他dapp和协议，然后向其他群友分享项目体验的经验。
contributionDescription: I was one of the first airdrop holders, and I had already experienced L2 deposits and withdrawals before the airdrop. At that time, the speed and fees for withdrawals were very high. After my first batch of airdrops arrived, I often participated in community voting and paid attention to the long-term development of the project. At the same time, after experiencing the dapp, I would share it with other netizens, such as bungee, fx, etc.
impactDescription: I was one of the first airdrop holders, and I had already experienced L2 deposits and withdrawals before the airdrop. pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged because it violates rule 11, as parts of the application are not in English.
